question: What is your return policy?
answer: Any Product/item can be returned or exchanged if it is incorrect/incomplete or defective/damaged within 7 days after delivery. Clicky.pk reserves the right to reject a return request found misusing our generous returns policy or a product received with missing tags and other components. Please note, delivery charges are non-refundable.
In case there is our mistake (damaged product or wrong item/size delivered), we will replace free of cost, and no charges will be deducted if the customer wants a refund.
In case Clicky dispatched the accurate product and the customer wants to exchange, then 400 charges will apply.
Perfumes and makeup products may only be returned if they are sealed, unopened, unused, and in their original packaging within a specified period of 7 days.

question: What are the conditions for return or exchange?
answer: The product must be in the same condition as delivered, unworn, unwashed, and without any flaws.
The product must include the original tags, with original packaging.
Your item needs to have the receipt, order number, or proof of purchase.

question: What is the procedure for Returns or Exchange?
answer: You can return your product easily through the Clicky app in a few seconds. Just follow these steps:
Sign in to your Clicky Account.
Go to the My Order section.
Click on the View Order for the specific order you want to place a replacement/refund request.
Select refund/replace option from the top and then click one or all items that you want returned or replaced.
Select the quantities and reason for replacement/refund.
Click on the SAVE button to submit the request.

question: What is the shipment method for return or exchange?
answer: Once you have created your return request as described above, you have to visit the nearest TCS express center to dispatch your shipment on our provided consignment number.

question: What is your refund or exchange policy?
answer: Once we receive your item at origin, we will notify you of the status of your refund or exchange after inspecting the item. Although it depends on the criteria of the product and your choice, the product is refundable or exchangeable.

question: When will I be refunded?
answer: Once your return is approved, we will initiate a refund to your preferred payment method within 48 hours.

question: When will I get my exchanged item?
answer: Transit time for the exchange shipment is the same as our standard delivery time (3 to 5 business days) from the time the exchange is shipped. You will be entitled to get an exchange of an equal value as your original order.

question: How can I cancel my order?
answer: In order to cancel your order, please log in to the Clicky app in your 'My Account' section. Open the order you want to cancel, and you will see an option to cancel the order. Your order can only be cancelled before it reaches the ‘Dispatched’ status in your 'My Account' on the Clicky app.

question: Can I modify the shipping address of my order after it's been placed?
answer: You can cancel the order and reorder the same product by adding a new address in your 'My Account' section. However, if the order is already in 'Dispatched' status, you won't be able to change the current order.

question: I just cancelled my order. When will I receive my refund?
answer: If you've selected Cash on Delivery, there's no amount to be refunded because you haven't paid for your order. For payments made via Credit/Debit Card/Netbanking, you will receive your refund to the source account within 5-7 days from the time you cancel your order.

question: What is Clicky's cancellation policy?
answer: Only orders that haven't left the fulfilment centre can be cancelled. If the order has already been shipped from our fulfilment centre, you can refuse to accept it and send it back with the courier. In case you have paid using Netbanking/Debit/Credit Card, we'll refund your order amount only after we've received the cancelled order at our fulfilment centre.

question: When can I expect the refund for the order I have returned the parcel?
answer: It takes 4-7 business days for us to receive the product back at our facility. After the product reaches our facility, we take another 2-3 days to refund the product amount back to you.

question: How would I be paid back as a refund?
answer: We would refund you either via bank transfer or using Easypaisa. In case of a refund to your Credit/Debit/Net banking account, we take 3-5 business days from the date of receipt of the items.

question: How can I keep track of the status of my orders?
answer: The ‘My Account' section in your Clicky App will help review the status of your orders, so that you can receive relevant information based on the respective ‘Order Number’.

question: Will I get a confirmation call from Clicky after placing an order?
answer: No, we don't call customers for order confirmation. All new customers are logged in to the Clicky app via OTP (one-time password), so we take this as order confirmation and ship you the order right away.

question: What are the delivery charges?
answer: Delivery charge is the fee that has to be paid for the on-time delivery of a purchased product. Our standard shipping charges are Rs 150, but it keeps on changing based on the number of products purchased. For the best understanding, please see the total shipping fee added to your order at the checkout page.

question: Do you offer international shipping?
answer: Currently, we only deliver within Pakistan. We are working on expanding our services to international locations soon.

question: What are the available payment methods?
answer: We accept Cash on Delivery, Bank Transfer, Easypaisa, and Credit/Debit Cards.

question: Can I track my order?
answer: Yes, you can track your order by logging into your Clicky account and navigating to the 'My Orders' section.

question: How long does delivery take?
answer: Orders are usually delivered within 3-7 business days, depending on your location.

question: Do you offer same-day delivery?
answer: Currently, we do not offer same-day delivery, but we are working on introducing express delivery options.

question: What happens if I receive a damaged or defective item?
answer: Please contact our support team within 7 days of receiving the item, and we will arrange a return or replacement.

question: Can I change my order after placing it?
answer: Unfortunately, once an order is placed, modifications are not allowed. However, you can cancel and reorder.

question: Are there any hidden charges?
answer: No, there are no hidden charges. The price you see at checkout is the final amount.

question: Do you have a loyalty program?
answer: Yes! We offer reward points that can be redeemed for discounts on future purchases.

question: How do I report a problem with my order?
answer: You can contact our support team through live chat, email, or phone for assistance.

question: Are your products original and authentic?
answer: Yes, we only sell 100% original and authentic products sourced from authorized distributors.

question: Do you provide warranties for products?
answer: Warranty details are mentioned on the product page if applicable.

question: Can I order without creating an account?
answer: No, you need to create an account to place an order and track your purchases.

question: What should I do if I forget my password?
answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions to reset your password.

question: Can I request gift wrapping?
answer: Yes, we offer gift-wrapping services at an additional charge.

question: Do you offer discounts for first-time customers?
answer: Yes! First-time customers can use a special discount code displayed on our website.

question: How can I contact customer support?
answer: You can reach us via live chat, email at support@clicky.pk, or call our helpline.

question: What do I do if I receive the wrong item?
answer: Please report the issue to our customer service team immediately for a free replacement.

question: Do you have physical stores?
answer: Currently, we are an online-only store, but we may expand to physical locations in the future.

question: Do you offer installment plans?
answer: Yes, selected products are available on installment plans through partner banks.

question: Are my payment details secure?
answer: Yes, we use encrypted payment gateways to ensure your transactions are safe.

question: Can I change my delivery address after placing an order?
answer: You can update the address before the order is dispatched by contacting our support team.

question: What should I do if my order is delayed?
answer: Check the tracking link in your account or contact customer support for an update.

question: Do you offer seasonal sales and promotions?
answer: Yes, we regularly offer discounts during seasonal sales, festivals, and special promotions.

question: Can I pre-order products?
answer: Yes, selected items are available for pre-order. Check product details for availability.

question: Do you sell gift cards?
answer: Yes, we offer gift cards that can be used for purchases on our website.

question: How can I subscribe to your newsletter?
answer: You can subscribe by entering your email in the subscription box on our homepage.

question: Do you offer student discounts?
answer: Yes, students can avail of special discounts by verifying their student ID.

question: Can I request a price match?
answer: We do not offer price matching at this time.

question: What happens if an item is out of stock?
answer: You can sign up for restock notifications on the product page.

question: Do you have an affiliate program?
answer: Yes, you can sign up for our affiliate program and earn commissions on referrals.

question: Can I return a sale item?
answer: Sale items can only be returned if they are defective or incorrect.

question: How do I leave a review on a product?
answer: You can leave a review by going to the product page and clicking on 'Write a Review.'

question: What is your environmental policy?
answer: We use eco-friendly packaging and support sustainable sourcing for our products.
